programme.title: Parineetii

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Hugh Jackman takes on the role of the legendary monster killer in this action adventurer. Follow the hunt as he fights to stop Dracula before he can hatch his twisted, dark plan.

programme.title: Dead Trigger: Unkilled
programme.desc: A post-apocalyptic film that sees an elite soldier unit stepping in to save humanity when a virus decimates the world and creates zombie hordes.

programme.title: Deadly DILF
programme.desc: A compelling thriller. A harmless flirtation between a college girl and the hot dad next door turns deadly when she becomes obsessed with him and tries to destroy his marriage.

programme.title: The Ex Obsession
programme.desc: An accidental death leads to stolen identity when a woman coerces her husband to assume her dead exs identity. Their desperate cover-up spirals into obsession.

programme.title: Nightmare Pageant Moms
programme.desc: A riveting thriller. A financially struggling mother and daughter enter a mother-daughter beauty pageant that could pay for her childs college. But things are not as they seem.

programme.title: Crescent Gang
programme.desc: A heartwarming family film. A group of kids in foster care embark on a scavenger hunt to save their home when they learn it is being sold and they will be separated.

programme.title: Christmas Down Under
programme.desc: A delightful Christmas adventure film. After a fight with her husband, Ellie follows him to Australia and enlists help to track him down.

programme.title: All Saints Christmas
programme.desc: A delightful holiday movie. When a popular RandB singers picture of her and her ex is misinterpreted as an engagement, her family insists he joins her on her trip back home.

programme.title: A Christmas Fumble
programme.desc: An enjoyable holiday romantic comedy. When an ambitious crisis manager is assigned a sports anchor who turns out to be her ex-boyfriend, old feelings resurface.

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: The usually charming Hugh Grant plays a self-centred exec who treats his star employee like his nanny. She finally quits, with hilarious consequences.

programme.title: The Secret Life Of Pets
programme.desc: When their owners are away, the pets play in this star-studded animation. Follow the life of a terrier whose jealousy of his new roommate leads them on a wild adventure.

programme.title: Dolphin Tale
programme.desc: A touching film. After rescuing a dolphin from a trap, a boy learns that the animals tail must be amputated, prompting him to convince a marine biologist to devise a solution.

programme.title: Keeping Up With The Kandasamys
programme.desc: A laugh-a-minute South African comedy about love and rivalry. A young couple falls for each other - despite their families best efforts to keep them apart.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: South Africas Neill Blomkamp directs Matt Damon in this gritty post-apocalyptic sci-fi film about last chances and sacrificing ones self for the greater good.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Not many films rival the visual spectacle of Christopher Nolans sci-fi epic. Leonardo DiCaprio and a stellar cast enter peoples dreams to steal corporate secrets.

programme.title: The Whale
programme.desc: Brendan Frasers performance in this moving psychological drama earned him an Oscar. A reclusive, morbidly obese English teacher tries to restore his relationship with his daughter.

programme.title: Perfectly Single
programme.desc: A conservative and socially awkward optometrist takes a leap of faith with a young suitor. Soon, her journey leads her down a path to self-discovery.

programme.title: Autumn In The City
programme.desc: An enjoyable romance film about Piper, who moves to New York City to find herself. There, she meets Austin, a jaded writer, and they discover the citys beauty together.

programme.title: Prisoner Of Love
programme.desc: Inspired by a real-life romantic crime story. A corrections officer falls in love with an inmate and helps him break him out of jail.

programme.title: Shamed
programme.desc: A delightful romcom. A magazine editor goes on an island trip to clear her mind and focus on her infamous Shamed List column, only to fall for one of the men on her List.

programme.title: The First Noelle
programme.desc: An ambitious young book editor named Noelle attempts to win back her ex after he returns home for Christmas with a new girlfriend, who also happens to be named Noelle.

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: Russell Brand drives this remake of an 80s classic. A rich playboy must choose between a marriage that will ensure his lavish lifestyle or a financially uncertain future with his true love.

programme.title: Valentines Day
programme.desc: This romantic comedy with an all-star cast follows the stories of couples, their make-ups, break-ups and all the expectations and pressures that Valentines Day brings.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic...
programme.sub-title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Kevin Hart lends his voice to this colourful superhero animation. Two pranksters hypnotise their principal into believing hes a superhero.

programme.title: Dolphin Tale 2
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman and Ashley Judd star in this sequel about friendship as a group of people in a marine hospital try and help a dolphin find a companion.

programme.title: Kandasamys: The Wedding
programme.desc: The madness continues in this sequel to the hit South African rom-com. It is a week before Jodi and Prishens wedding and their love is tested as the family interfere once more.

programme.title: The Hitmans Bodyguard
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds and Sam Jackson dive headfirst into action for this chaotic comedy. A low-level bodyguard reluctantly agrees to protect a crazy hitman with valuable testimony.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Sport meets romance in this Tom Cruise rom-com that showed us the money! A successful sports agent who loses everything is determined to get back what he once had.

programme.title: Naked Singularity
programme.desc: A book-inspired legal drama with sci-fi and heist themes. Frustrated with the justice system, a New York City public defender is pulled into a high-stakes heist to beat the system.

programme.title: In Bruges
programme.desc: Colin Farrell takes centre stage in this dark crime comedy. After a job gone wrong, two Irish hitmen are told to lay low in Belgium, but they find themselves in trouble.

programme.title: White People Money
programme.desc: In this hilarious satire, a couple learns that having a lot of money comes with many troubles after they win $1 billion and try to keep it a secret from everyone.

programme.title: Contention
programme.desc: Marley is caught in a dilemma after being involved with two blood sisters. With a baby on the way, he needs to make a choice. Who will it be?

programme.title: Dumb Wife
programme.desc: Driven by fear of feministic rebellion, Jidenna opts for a village-groomed lady at the expense of his ongoing relationship.

programme.title: Trigger
programme.desc: An event that happened in the past causes so much trauma for Dammy, a job and an acquaintance with Amara provides an opportunity to overcome his challenges.

programme.title: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: A young mother juggles between the hospital and her menial jobs just to keep her son alive. Not a day goes by that she does not make a confession. What guilt could she be harbouring?

programme.title: The Scoop
programme.desc: A news and gossip show about the film, fashion, music and entertainment industry. Khanyi Mbau introduces inserts and stories, and gives the scoop on local celebrities.

programme.title: Wear My Shoes
programme.desc: Joshua has not been supportive of Ese during their home activities. To help him understand the stress Ese experiences every day, a shift in his career has occurred.

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: Gabby Thompsons is finding it difficult to deal with a business setback, while Aj tries to get Nana hooked with a movie star.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: One doesnt have to play well, its enough to play better than your adversary.

programme.title: Heart Strokes
programme.desc: Ginika is left with no option other than to carry reason alongside her emotions as she meanders the slippery streets of relationships.

programme.title: Ghetto Girl
programme.desc: Destiny is struggling with a compulsion to steal, and her behaviour has become a daily problem for her sister, Agnes. Agnes reaches out to a podcaster named Somto, also known as Mr Fixer.

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: Gabby Thompsons is finding it difficult to deal with a business setback, while Aj tries to get Nana hooked with a movie star.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: One doesnt have to play well, its enough to play better than your adversary.

programme.title: The Next Marriage
programme.desc: Two conniving siblings concoct a scheme to manipulate their brother into a whirlwind romance, believing his newfound love will grant them their own personal gains.

programme.title: The Teacher
programme.desc: Anthonia picks up a second job to raise enough money for her mothers medical bills. This new job brings with it some challenges that could threaten her goal.

programme.title: Depths Of Despair
programme.desc: In order to live with the pain, Bode becomes a recluse unable to unburden himself of the self-inflicted anguish he created.

programme.title: Paternity
programme.desc: An expecting man battles the paternity of his unborn child with another man with who his wife had an affair.

programme.desc: When the Earth is threatened by an alien warrior, a wise-cracking jiu jitsu trainer helps an injured master fighter prepare for the ultimate battle.

programme.desc: A retired mobster seeks redemption but faces betrayal and vengeance in a deadly game of loyalty and revenge in this spellbinder.

programme.title: Hollow Man II
programme.desc: A web of conspiracies comes to light as a scientist attempts to evade an invisible assassin whose condition is slowly destroying his body and mind.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of the best action movies. In each episode, youll get all the secrets straight from your favourite action heroes.

programme.title: ParaNorman
programme.desc: In order to save his town from a centuries-old curse, a misunderstood youngster must take on ghouls and zombies - not to mention grown-ups.

programme.title: The Boxtrolls
programme.desc: An orphaned boy, raised by a community of underground rubbish gatherers, teams up with a young girl to scupper the plans of an evil exterminator.

programme.title: Spirit Untamed
programme.desc: A city girl who moves to the wilderness finds an unexpected soulmate in an untamed mustang horse, leading to a breathless series of adventures.

programme.title: Diary Of A Wimpy Kid: Dog Days
programme.desc: A teenagers plans to spend a lazy summer are dashed thanks to his parents plans, while a family-friendly camping trip turns into a disaster.

programme.title: The Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: When a vicious hockey player tells his step-daughter the Tooth Fairy isnt real, he is summoned to a magical land and sentenced to become one himself.

programme.title: The Archer
programme.desc: A young archery champion is sent to a reform establishment after beating her friends abusive partner.

programme.title: Fat Albert

programme.sub-title: Percy Jackson and The Olympians: The Lightning Thief
programme.desc: A teenager discovers that he is a descendent of Poseidon, and embarks on an adventure to prevent a war amongst the Greek gods.
A writer (John Cusack) struggles to find a save haven for his family when neutrinos from a solar flare trigger disaster on an apocalyptic scale.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.: Under Siege
programme.desc: A SWAT compound comes under fire from a terrorist who is chasing a mystery man apprehended by the Seattle SWAT.

programme.title: The Fast And The Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: After moving to Tokyo with his father to avoid a jail sentence, Alabama teenager Sean Boswell becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing.

programme.title: Big Bear
programme.desc: A dumped boyfriend is persuaded to go ahead with his bachelor party - but things get out of hand when one of his friends abducts his exs new beau.

programme.title: Supercool
programme.desc: An awkward high-school teenager gets more than he bargained for when his wish to be cool enough to woo his dream girl comes true the very next day.

programme.title: Lion
programme.desc: An Australian man uses Google Earth to find his long-lost family and journey home back to india after 25 years, recounting his journey of survival.

programme.desc: The year is 1536 and a Scottish clansman is mortally wounded in battle by a terrifying warrior.

programme.desc: Dejà vu unexpectedly guides an ATF agent through an investigation into a shattering crime.

programme.desc: The sudden appearance of one man in a world where apes are in charge and humans are enslaved serves as a challenge to the status quo.
